meanings.definition: The quality or state of being early.
meanings.sent1: Her punctuality and earlinesses always impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The earlinesses of the sunrise brought a sense of calm to the morning.
meanings.sent3: The earlinesses of the squirrel gathering nuts made the other animals chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The earlinesses of the flowers blooming in spring painted the fields with color.
meanings.sent5: The earlinesses of the student's arrival to class made a lasting impression on the teacher.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of occurring or being done early.
meanings.sent1: The earlinesses of the meeting allowed everyone to finish work on time.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the earlinesses of the first snowfall this year.
meanings.sent3: The earlinesses of the bakery opening made the town excited for fresh pastries.
meanings.sent4: The earlinesses of the bird's song signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The earlinesses of the train departure prevented any delays in the journey.
